storyOfTheWeek.title: Hoard things you know how to do
storyOfTheWeek.summary: Agentic Engineering Patterns > Many of my tips for working productively with coding agents are extensions of advice I've found useful in my career without them. Here's a great example of that: hoard things you know how to do. A big part of the skill in building software is understanding what's possible and what isn't, and having at least a rough idea of how those things can be accomplished. These questions can be broad or quite obscure. Can a web page run OCR operations in JavaScript alone? Can
